title: Ticket #90: Thread problems with Amazon EC2 GAHP on AIX
description:
Apparently, Condor’s use of gsoap doesn’t support any use of threads on AIX. The patch file src/condor_daemon_core.V6/stdsoap2.h.patch comments out thread-related #defines for AIX in the generated file src/condor_includes/stdsoap2.h.

Since the amazon_gahp uses gsoap and threads, it won’t work with our usage of gsoap on AIX. Problems with incorrect errno values were observed in testing, due to _THREAD_SAFE not being defined.

For now, the amazon_gahp is disabled for AIX.
remarks:
2009-Nov-04 13:44:17 by matt:
I propose this be closed WONTFIX
creator: jfrey
